dmca.title: [EV1-C2511182K] Copying of forums

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not

Multipart prefix (text/plain)
This is a multipart message in MIME format. 
 
MIME element (text/plain) 
Hi   
 
  
 
I recently had a group of individuals go and copy a 2 and half year old
forum, that I own. They are using your hosting services. I have asked
them to modify the forum to not to reflect  the style and user
experience of my forums. Yes I did use open source software. But when
you more or less copy css themes and 150 near identical boards on the
forum its copyright theft. 
 
  
 
Can you please clarify what you do in this case before I make a formal
email to you regarding this 
 
  
 
Thanks 
 
Taras
